RT @InfoQ: Winds of Change: SkyDrive Gets Text Editor, New Name http://t.co/rJJal7YAXW
posts.caption: www.infoq.com
posts.description: Microsoft's SkyDrive is not just getting a new name, but it also is getting enhanced offline browsing abilities as well as a new lightweight text editing component.

posts.message:
SA,
Anybody wrote extensions to Microsoft Pex before ?

I'm looking for a Linux tutorial for experienced Windows user. Not a guide for basic functions (installing, finding programs, Internet browsing, etc.), but understanding of how Linux works and how I can do some modest hacking like I do in Windows (open the registry, find where applications are installed, modify them, etc.). 
Preferably video.
Thanks
